text: Kalkoti is a Dardic language of the Shina sub-branch of Pakistan. It is primarily spoken in Upper Dir District, in the Kalkot Tehsil. It has a lot of loanwords from Indus Kohistani. ==References== Category:Languages of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Category:Dardic languages Category:Upper Dir District
title: Kalkoti language
